channel.title: Possible Worlds on
channel.description: Recent content in Possible Worlds on

item.title: Science
item.description: It is our strong belief that the AI of the future will be based on science, rather than ad-hoc methods. We strive to simulate the most precious aspects of human cognition: the ability to explain, understand and imagine. Our strategy is to combine cutting-edge research in cognitive science and computational modelling to develop new types of algorithms. To learn about the science underpinning our technology, check out Denotation IO.

item.title: Team
item.description: Nina Rismal Nina is an economist and political philosopher interested in social change. LinkedIn Aurelie Herbelot Aurelie is a computer scientist specialised in Natural Language Processing. LinkedIn Website

item.title: About
item.description: At Possible Worlds, we actively integrate AI research and development with deep insights from social science, politics and the arts.

item.title: Contact
item.description: For any enquiry about Possible Worlds, please contact us at: user="contact",domain="possible-worlds.xyz",document.write(user+"@"+domain);contact at possible-worlds.xyz
